fields.name: **__Spam__**
fields.value:
The bot will automatically delete spam and temporarily mute the user.
The triggers for this are listed below:
Messages: 10 messages in 10 seconds
Mentions: 5 mentions in 30 seconds
Links: 10 links in 60 seconds
Emojis: 30 emojis in 120 seconds
New Lines: 60 new lines in 120 seconds
Duplicate Messaes: 5 duplicates in 30 seconds

fields.name: **__Restricted Words__**
fields.value:
Messages containing certain words will automatically be deleted by the bot.
These messages are logged for staff members to see.

fields.name: **__Minor Infractions/First Infraction__**
fields.value: Verbal Warning - A staff member asks the user to stop.

fields.name: **__More Serious Infractions/Second Infraction__**
fields.value: Written Warning to #mod-logs - A staff member issues a warning to #mod-logs.

fields.name: **__Serious Infractions/Third Infraction__**
fields.value: Tempmute - A staff member temporarily mutes the user.

fields.name: **__Repeated Infractions__**
fields.value: Tempban/Ban - A staff member bans the user from the server either temporarily or perminantly.

fields.name: **__Please note:__**
fields.value: Staff members will determine the proper punishment based on the infraction.
